translation: But he who knows the Truth, O mighty-armed Arjuna, about the divisions of the qualities and their functions, knowing that the Gunas, as senses, move amidst the Gunas, as the sense-objects, is not attached.
commentary: 3.28 Tattvavit the knower of the Truth? You but? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? of the divisions of alities and functions? Gunas the alities (in the shape of senses)? in the qualities amidst the alities (in the shape of objects)? vartante remain? It is thus? considering knowing? Not not? sajjate is attached.Commentary He who knows the truth that the Self is entirely distinct from the three Gunas and actions does
